profile: Serving all of central Ontario from  The Muskokas -Peel Region- York Region - Dufferin Region -Simcoe Region - Georgetown -Milton , Closets by Design is the industry leader in custom manufactured organizational systems. We design, build and install custom closets, garage cabinets and flooring, home offices, laundries, pantries, and much more. From our no obligation in-home consultation, custom tailored designs, and the highest quality canadian product construction, our products offer the best value in the industry. Check us out at barrie.closetsbydesign.com.

profile:
Family Business, Home Office, No Sales people, No Middleman.

Friendly Service and Prices.

You will save more than 60% on your project !!!



Hi,

My name is Alex. 

I am a window installer. 

I have been working for one of the largest window companies for 22 years. 

I had many wonderful years being a part of a good and reliable company. My partner Mike and I, were the best installation team in the company, our main office always gave us the most difficult projects. We solve problems all the time. Windows were installed the right way, to make our clients and the main office happy at all times.

I was busy.

However, for the last few years the economy has been struggling, especially for renovation companies. For the last two years I received less and less installation orders from my office. It was a hard time for me and my family. I have three wonderful kids and as a man of the household it is my job to support them financially.

Mike and I decided to run our own business and do our own window installations. We get windows directly from the factory and install them for home owners like you. 

•	Family Business
•	Home Office
•	Friendly Service
•	No sales people
•	No middleman
•	No hidden fees

No extra expenses from your pocket !


You will save more than 60% on your project !!!

Call me today and I will come to your place, I will give you an absolutely free consultation on how we can install new windows the right way and of course for the right price.

If you become my client, you will receive all that you expect from any reputable window company. I will give you a lifetime warranty for windows and my labor. I am fully certified, I have all necessary licenses, certificates, insurance and WSIB. Call me and you will receive a full top of the line service, for a special price from Windows by Installer.

I have been a window installer all my life, I love my job. I love my clients. I like to see  smiling faces.

Give me a call today 416-628-8008 and you will be happy! I always keep my word. 



Regards,

Alex
service_area: Greater Toronto Area, Hamilton, Barrie, London, Niagara Falls. . .
name: Windows By Installer

profile:
No dreams are too big or too small

We listen to you and the dreams you have for your home. Hammerschlag Construction will make them happen by being your partner in this overall process.

We will turn your vision into drawings that reflect the look, style and spirit you desire. They will be explained to you in plain language and any questions you have will be answered directly to your satisfaction.

Here's how Hammerschlag Construction stands out from the competition:

A dedicated and responsible Construction Manager will be at your service from concept
to completion
Throughout your renovation, you will know what is happening and why
Only qualified professionals who have the right experience, skills and tools to do the job properly will work on your home
The latest equipment, techniques and technologies will be used on your project
The safety and the protection of your property is our priority


Hammerschlag Construction is an all in one Home and comercial Renovation, Kitchen Renovation, Basement Renovation and bathroom renovation company working throughout Toronto and the GTA. We also specialize in all home improvement services. We service Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Markham, Toronto, North York and all surrounding areas in the GTA
name: Hammerschlag Construction

profile:
RENOVATION THAT MAKES A STATEMENT
Looking to elevate your property? Whether you want a full or a partial home renovation, Dash Renovations has got you covered. We are a team of dedicated builders, designers, project managers, and renovators who are passionate about all things construction.

Our renovation service isn’t exclusive to home renovation only. We also work with business owners and building managers to renovate their office space. We believe that a great work atmosphere starts with a great workplace. As a result, we extend office renovation services to give your business the professional look you need to impress.

When you hire Dash Renovations, you can be sure you’ll be met with a high work ethic, expert knowledge, and integrity. Trust that we value all our customers and believe that our success lies in your happiness.
name: DASH Renovations
